response.overview: Geoffery Rogers has been a reporter in Rochester, NY for nearly a decade and he’s only 22 years old. Full of dreams, he aspires to build a media empire. Beginning at age 12 with just an iPhone and a bicycle, he began riding around his neighborhood reporting stories. Energetic, funny and full of self-confidence, he quickly attracted the support of seasoned journalists, law-enforcement, and a community that wanted to help him succeed. His passion and optimism made him the kind of inspirational role-model everyone could rally around. He seemed to be well on the way to accomplishing his goals. But childhood doesn’t last forever. Now, as a young man, Geoffery is experiencing growing pains as he tries to to turn his passion into a self-supporting business. His outspoken opinions, questionable reporting tactics, and a series of embarrassing legal problems threaten to make him infamous before he can become famous.
response.title: Geoffery Show Live
